alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Broward County through 445 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Boca Raton to Port Everglades to Hard Rock Stadium. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Pompano Beach, Boca Raton, Deerfield Beach, Lighthouse Point, Lauderdale-By-The-Sea, Highland Beach, Hallandale, Miami Gardens, Oakland Park, Aventura, Dania Beach, West Park, Wilton Manors, Hillsboro Beach, Sea Ranch Lakes and Lazy Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
